name: jsmpeg
description: 1) Ensure you have brew installed ffmpeg, http-server and ws. 2) Run `node websocket-relay.js supersecret 8081 8082` to run stream and websocket server. 3) In a separate tab run `http-server` in the root directory to run the consumer server. 4) Run `ffmpeg -f avfoundation -framerate 30 -video_size 640x480 -i "0:0" -f mpegts -codec:v mpeg1video -s 640x480 -b:v 1000k -bf 0 http://localhost:8081/supersecret` which streams the MAC camera to the stream server.
